channel.title: Is Tom a robot?
channel.description:
Ok hear me out...
I have a theory that Tom is actually a robot that is powered by being liked. This is why he is less active nowadays, he is running out of juice and we need to recharge him to get anything done on the forums.
[i] Proof:[/i] 1. Tom was extremely active when the site was more active and he was making changes that people liked. 2. Now that there are no changes and people don't care about him, he is hardly ever doing anything on the forums. Obviously IRC is an exception because it requires much less power and resources to use. 3. Same thing happened on MoparCraft. Everything was going great, staff was liked, and then Tom took over and made it a PvP server and was killing people. They didn't like that, server died, no more fuel for Tom, he left. 4. Tom went to great lengths to unban people, change banning protocol, and undo warnings people got. Why? So that more people were here to like him. 5. If you see Tom's pictures, he always has acne on the same spots. How would that make sense unless it was actually just a mask over a mechanical body?
Can't really dispute it guys.
[i] What do we do?[/i] Share the love however you can. Send him nice PM's, flowers, candy, tell him he's doing a great job and didn't completely murder the forums in cold blood like some think he did. Try to be more active. Whenever the robot sees the forum stats, he realizes just how much he's ruined the site. We need to make them look good for a change.
Please help us bring Tom back.

item.title: Is Tom a robot?
item.dc:creator: @Native_Method Native Method
item.description:
@Native_Method wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:1, topic:547655”]Ok hear me out…

I have a theory that Tom is actually a robot that is powered by being liked. This is why he is less active nowadays, he is running out of juice and we need to recharge him to get anything done on the forums.


Proof:

  1. Tom was extremely active when the site was more active and he was making changes that people liked.
  2. Now that there are no changes and people don’t care about him, he is hardly ever doing anything on the forums. Obviously IRC is an exception because it requires much less power and resources to use.
  3. Same thing happened on MoparCraft. Everything was going great, staff was liked, and then Tom took over and made it a PvP server and was killing people. They didn’t like that, server died, no more fuel for Tom, he left.
  4. Tom went to great lengths to unban people, change banning protocol, and undo warnings people got. Why? So that more people were here to like him.
  5. If you see Tom’s pictures, he always has acne on the same spots. How would that make sense unless it was actually just a mask over a mechanical body?

Can’t really dispute it guys.


What do we do?
Share the love however you can. Send him nice PM’s, flowers, candy, tell him he’s doing a great job and didn’t completely murder the forums in cold blood like some think he did.
Try to be more active. Whenever the robot sees the forum stats, he realizes just how much he’s ruined the site. We need to make them look good for a change.

Please help us bring Tom back.[/quote]

Shut up faggot.

Read full topic
